tweet: Seriously, tho, if you are making eyes at a Yotes fan in your life, consider a gift from @OELofSweden maybe. Too great a concept to pass up!
I love the way OEL plays-- he has a conservative-looking stride, but his movement is always purposeful and his skill can take over a game.
Legendary defenseman and underwear purveyor Oliver Ekman-Larsson. üòÇ
Also, apparently @OEL_23 has a lifestyle brand, @OELofSweden, which is awesome and hilarious.
I love to watch the chemistry that's developing between Domi and Duclair, and OEL is just an absolute legend. This'll be a great game!
Since one of my best friends went to ASU and came back a huge Yotes fan, I've been watching them a lot this year. Fun team, for sure!
When I was 6, 7 years old I was a huge Nikolai Khabibulin fan, and I LOVED the Yotes' jerseys.
I happen to quite like the @ArizonaCoyotes, even though I cheer for the Penguins. I owned a kachina jersey as a kid!
I'm optimistic about the #Pens chances tonight against the Coyotes, but since one of my best friends is a Yotes fan I hope it's a close one!

I love all these boys! Let's hope they can put together a big win tonight! https://t.co/1OiXFpjzw5
Either way, I hope to see Dustin succeed at whatever level he plays at for the #Pens. Good guy, dece player, and well worth another shot!
Dustin Jeffrey has been having a nice year in the AHL, and could be better in the NHL without the boat-anchors he played with in the past.
The #Pens also re-acquired Dustin Jeffrey, which I see as a low-risk move with a minimal chance of NHL playing time, barring injuries.
There's a strong case to be made for keeping Zatkoff given that his trade value has been diminished and it was a buyer's market for goalies.
I think Murray will be the #Pens backup for the stretch run, but it's still smart to keep Zatkoff within the organization.
I'm surprised that so many people on #Pens Twitter thought that a Zatkoff move was imminent based on Murray's call up.
I'm happy to see Sergei Plotnikov get out from under the #Pens forward depth chart, and wish him nothing but the best in AZ.
So, the trade deadline has come and gone, and there's been some changes to the look and feel of the #Pens, for sure.
